Fire.name: Fire
Fire.notes: If overpowering Wind, increases effect by an additional 25%.

Wind.name: Wind
Wind.notes: If used with Fire of equivalent power, merged effect +25%. Fans give +1% per fan rank.

Lightning.name: Lightning
Lightning.notes: If combined with Water, effect increased by 25%.

YinYang.name: Yin-Yang
YinYang.notes: 25% more effective and 25% resistant to other chakra natures. Special cases: cursed or malevolent chakra is 25% resistant and 25% more effective against Yin-Yang; sage/nature chakra is 50% more resistant and 50% more effective.
